meanings.definition: To shine brightly or emit light again.
meanings.sent1: The sun reglows after the storm passes.
meanings.sent2: The stars reglows in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The flashlight reglows just when we needed it most.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reglows like a beacon of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The fireflies reglows, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of shining brightly or emitting light again.
meanings.sent1: The reglows of the sunrise brought a sense of renewal.
meanings.sent2: The reglows of the city at night were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The reglows of the disco ball added a fun touch to the party.
meanings.sent4: The reglows of the lighthouse guided ships to safety.
meanings.sent5: The reglows of the fire danced in the darkness, warming our hearts.
